name: Pachinko Bakery
description:
You've inherited your great grandfather's old bakery. Unfortunately the place is pretty run down and you don't have enough money to pay the rent. Can you make $700 to be able to keep it?

This game was made in 3 days for the 94th mini jam.

Feedback form: https://forms.gle/vMcSfnmAd5vi2rrH9
Feel free to fill it out to help me improve for future games!

Soundtrack: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLS74pJwD4TnydqBISELS6DrywMzhEU6MK

Controls

Left click = interact

Right click = fire cannon

Credits

Ategon - Art, Coding & Music

I may come back to this idea in the future to make a larger game as I really enjoy how it turned out.

Known bugs

The music will occasionally not loop
